nodes.text: Mos Shuuta was a small city on the planet Tatooine, and the location of the palace of Hutt Cartel crime lord, Teemo the Hutt. Mos Shuuta was situated on the top of a tall, rocky bluff, with nothing but endless desert in every direction around it.

The picture used to represent Mos Shuuta in The Long Arm of the Hutt was first released in the Squadrons Over Corellia expansion of the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game, where it was used to represent Mos Espa.
